It’s hilarious, but the character designs are hideous and it doesn’t feel like Dr. Seuss
Well, you get enjoyment out of some parts…BUT MY GOSH! This movie ruined me and it’s kind of my childhood trauma, especially Thing 1 and 2 THIS MOVIE IS BAD
One of the worst movies ever made. Even as a kid I hated it. The film so bad, Dr Seuss's widow banned anymore live action adaptations of her late husband's beloved work.
very funny, i love this movie XD

The movie is great and a good interpretation of what a live-action Cat in the Hat is capable of, with slapstick humor and great acting by the children and step dad it also shows how things might always come to light, as seen with how the stepdad treated the kids and how the Cat in the Hat helps get rid of him. The movie is great; I hate all the negative reviews. The movie is great; I hate all the negative reviews.
Es una muy buena película me encanto

Seppur Mike Mayers riesce un pò a salvare questo disastro per la sua recitazione il resto del cast è penoso, le battute non fanno ridere neanche i bambini, il cattivo è mediocre, ma soprattutto il design del gatto era da film horror, veramente una pessima trovata per riportare in vita un vecchio brand degli anni 50, Il Grinch di Jim Carry perlomeno era divertente.
Dr. Seuss a saperlo si rivolterebbe nella tomba.
Evitate questo film se potete, è un incubo per bambini, adulti e fan di Seuss
UNA PESADILLA ECHO REALIDAD
I always watched this as a kid and i loved it and I still love it!
I used to love watching this movie as a kid <3
This is a pure cinematic masterpiece that puts everything else to shame. Bo Welch shows his genius in the making of this film. These actors were snubbed of Oscar’s by the academy.
